title: 【转】转换PC地图成PE地图-How to port Minecraft PC maps to Pocket Edition
author: 星E君
txt_content:
本帖最后由 天迹灬战狂神 于 2013-12-13 22:08 编辑 

http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XNjQ3OTI0NzA4/v.swf


原地址：
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XNRKvT6wx_w#t=86


原介绍：
[spoiler]Hello everyone! I simple wanted to make a tutorial today to help grow the community's map databases! I hope you enjoy and are able to port lots of maps for the Pocket Edition community to download! :)

Thanks everyone!

Get your own server today:
http://hosting.potpotsie.com

Sign up to mcpeuniverse.com here:
http://mcpeuniverse.com

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/potpotsie_

Have a great d
